message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CC 

The paper is about curriculum learning strategies for information retrieval (IR) in the context of conversation response ranking. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IR (Information Retrieval). The paper also discusses scoring functions and pacing functions, which are common topics in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML), suggesting that cs.CL (Computation and Language) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely categories. Additionally, the paper uses neural models, which are commonly used in artificial intelligence (AI) research (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses large-scale datasets, which could also fall under the category of cs.CC (Computational Complexity).
